title: Pulp Fiction
plot: The lives of two mob hitmen, a boxer, a gangster and his wife, and a pair of diner bandits intertwine in four tales of violence and redemption.
keyScene: John Travolta is forced to inject adrenaline directly into Uma Thurman's heart after she overdoses on heroin.

title: The Dark Knight
plot: When the menace known as the Joker wreaks havoc and chaos on the people of Gotham, Batman must accept one of the greatest psychological and physical tests of his ability to fight injustice.
keyScene: Batman angrily responds 'Iâ€™m Batman' when asked who he is by Falcone.

title: Fight Club
plot: An insomniac office worker and a devil-may-care soapmaker form an underground fight club that evolves into something much, much more.
keyScene: Brad Pitt explains the rules of Fight Club to Edward Norton. The first rule of Fight Club is: You do not talk about Fight Club. The second rule of Fight Club is: You do not talk about Fight Club.

title: Inception
plot: A thief who steals corporate secrets through the use of dream-sharing technology is given the inverse task of planting an idea into thed of a C.E.O.
keyScene: Leonardo DiCaprio explains the concept of inception to Ellen Page by using a child's spinning top.

title: The Matrix
plot: A computer hacker learns from mysterious rebels about the true nature of his reality and his role in the war against its controllers.
keyScene: Red pill or blue pill? Morpheus offers Neo a choice between the red pill, which will allow him to learn the truth about the Matrix, or the blue pill, which will return him to his former life.

title: The Shawshank Redemption
plot: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.
keyScene: Andy Dufresne escapes from Shawshank prison by crawling through a sewer pipe.

title: Goodfellas
plot: The story of Henry Hill and his life in the mob, covering his relationship with his wife Karen Hill and his mob partners Jimmy Conway and Tommy DeVito in the Italian-American crime syndicate.
keyScene: Joe Pesci's character Tommy DeVito shoots young Spider in the foot for not getting him a drink.

title: Se7en
plot: Two detectives, a rookie and a veteran, hunt a serial killer who uses the seven deadly sins as his motives.
keyScene: Brad Pitt's character David Mills shoots John Doe after he reveals that he murdered Mills' wife.

title: The Silence of the Lambs
plot: A young F.B.I. cadet must receive the help of an incarcerated and manipulative cannibal killer to help catch another serial killer, a madman who skins his victims.
keyScene: Hannibal Lecter explains to Clarice Starling that he ate a census taker's liver with some fava beans and a nice Chianti.

title: The Godfather
plot: An organized crime dynasty's aging patriarch transfers control of his clandestine empire to his reluctant son.
keyScene: James Caan's character Sonny Corleone is shot to death at a toll booth by a number of machine gun toting enemies.

title: The Departed
plot: An undercover cop and a mole in the police attempt to identify each other while infiltrating an Irish gang in South Boston.
keyScene: Leonardo DiCaprio's character Billy Costigan is shot to death by Matt Damon's character Colin Sullivan.

title: The Usual Suspects
plot: A sole survivor tells of the twisty events leading up to a horrific gun battle on a boat, which began when five criminals met at a seemingly random police lineup.
keyScene: Kevin Spacey's character Verbal Kint is revealed to be the mastermind behind the crime, when his limp disappears as he walks away from the police station.

title: The Pursuit of Happyness
plot: Chris Gardner, a struggling salesman, faces homelessness and single fatherhood. Despite the challenges, he perseveres in an unpaid internship at a prestigious brokerage firm, pursuing a better life for himself and his son.
keyScene: Chris celebrates joyfully after landing a full-time job at the brokerage firm, securing a brighter future for him and his son.

title: Click
plot: Michael Newman, a workaholic architect, stumbles upon a universal remote control that allows him to manipulate time. Initially using it for convenience, he soon realizes the importance of cherishing life's precious moments.
keyScene: Michael fast-forwards through life using the remote and realizes the unintended consequences of missing out on important family moments.

title: Bohemian Rhapsody
plot: A biographical film about the legendary rock band Queen and its lead singer, Freddie Mercury. The movie follows their rise to fame, iconic performances, and personal struggles, culminating in their historic Live Aid performance.
keyScene: The Live Aid concert, where Freddie Mercury delivers a show-stopping performance, captivating the audience with 'Bohemian Rhapsody'.

title: Rocketman
plot: This biographical musical drama chronicles the life of musician Elton John. The film delves into his early days as a prodigy at the Royal Academy of Music, his rise to stardom, struggles with addiction, and eventual acceptance of his true identity.
keyScene: Elton John's first performance at The Troubadour in Los Angeles, which marks the turning point of his career.

title: Titanic
plot: A fictionalized account of the tragic sinking of the RMS Titanic during its maiden voyage. The movie revolves around the ill-fated love story between Jack Dawson and Rose DeWitt Bukater as they struggle to survive the ship's catastrophic collision with an iceberg.
keyScene: Jack and Rose standing at the bow of the ship, embracing each other while declaring they are 'king of the world'.

title: Ghost
plot: After being murdered, Sam Wheat becomes a ghost and must protect his girlfriend, Molly Jensen, from impending danger. With the help of a psychic, Oda Mae Brown, Sam tries to communicate and unravel the mystery surrounding his death.
keyScene: Sam and Molly share a poignant moment while sculpting clay together, expressing their love and connection beyond the physical realm.

title: Pinocchio
plot: Based on the classic fairy tale, this animated film follows the adventures of Pinocchio, a wooden puppet brought to life by a kind fairy. Pinocchio embarks on a journey to prove himself worthy of becoming a real boy, facing temptations and challenges along the way.
keyScene: Pinocchio's transformation into a real boy as a reward for his bravery and selflessness.

title: Adrenaline
plot: In this fast-paced action thriller, a former hitman is forced back into the dangerous world of assassinations when his daughter is kidnapped by a vengeful drug lord. With time running out, he must use his deadly skills to save her and confront his past.
keyScene: The intense final showdown between the protagonist and the drug lord's henchmen as he fights to rescue his daughter.
